dublinCore.dc:title: 119 HR 5730 IH: To amend the Federal Water Pollution Control Act to reauthorize sewer overflow and stormwater reuse municipal grants.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Deluzio introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

form.official-title: To amend the Federal Water Pollution Control Act to reauthorize sewer overflow and stormwater reuse municipal grants.

section.header: Sewer overflow and stormwater reuse municipal grants
section.text: Section 221 of the Federal Water Pollution Control Act (33 U.S.C. 1301) is amended in subsection (f) by striking paragraph (1) and insertingâ€”

paragraph.text: There is authorized to be appropriated to carry out this section $350,000,000 for each of fiscal years 2026 through 2031.
